## Tutorials & Books

Learn Python programming and data science with these free resources:

* [Programming with Python](https://swcarpentry.github.io/python-novice-inflammation/) by Software Carpentry
* [Python Intro](https://developers.google.com/edu/python/introduction) by Google
* [Python for Beginners](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/shows/intro-to-python-development/) by Microsoft
* [Python for Data Analysis, 3E](https://wesmckinney.com/book/) by Wes McKinney (creator of pandas library)
* [Python Data Science Handbook](https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/) by Jake VanderPlas
* [Numpy Quick Start](https://numpy.org/doc/stable/user/quickstart.html)
* [10 Minutes to Pandas](https://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/user_guide/10min.html)
* [Python Style Guide](https://peps.python.org/pep-0008/)

##  Python Cloud Notebook Services

Run Python code in the cloud with these free services:

* [Google Colab](https://colab.research.google.com/)
* [UofT JupyterHub](https://datatools.utoronto.ca/) (choose Jupyter or JupterLab for Python)
* [Anaconda Cloud](https://anaconda.cloud/) (choose the free tier)
